      • completedAllAssessments

        public boolean completedAllAssessments​(java.lang.String studentID)
        Checks if student has completed all assessment in the unit
        Parameters:
        studentID - student ID of the student
        Returns:
        boolean result of student completion of all asssements

      • getTotalStudentMarks

        public double getTotalStudentMarks​(java.lang.String studentID)
        getter for total student marks in the unit. Returns 0 if student has not completed all assessments in the unit or not enrolled
        Parameters:
        studentID - student ID of student
        Returns:
        actual total student marks of the unit if and only if the student is enrolled and completed all assessments

      • setStudentMark

        public void setStudentMark​(java.lang.String studentID,
                           Mark mark,
                           Assessment assessment)
        setter for student mark of an assessment in the unit
        Parameters:
        studentID - student ID of the student.
        mark - Mark object of the mark to be given to the student.
        assessment - Assessment object which can consist of Exam or Asssignment.

        Returns:
